name: Sinful Popcorn
story: 12 cups popped popcorn 1 Cube Real Butter
ingredients: 1 cup Pecans roughly chopped 1/2 tsp baking soda
steps: ~Place popcorn and pecans in large bowl.
~Combine brown sugar and cinnamon in a large bowl.
~Chop butter into chunks and place on top of sugar mixture.
~Pour corn syrup over the top of everything.
Microwave on high for 30 seconds stir to combine.
~Return to microwave and heat for 2 minutes.
~Return to microwave and cook 2 more minutes. By this point it should be nice and bubbly.
~Remove from microwave, add vanilla and baking soda.
~Pour over popcorn stir lots and fast.
~Bake at 250 degrees, for 30 minutes stirring every 10 minutes.
~With fork drizzle melted almond bark on top of popcorn.
